scrnaseq.cellcomm 1.0.0

Save interactions as xlsx

save_as_xlsx.Rd

Save interactions as xlsx

Usage

save_as_xlsx(
  interactions_agg_integration,
  condition_var = "Condition_dummy",
  alpha = 0.05,
  output_dir = ".",
  output_name = "interactions_summary",
  is_stringent = FALSE
)

Arguments

interactions_agg_integration

path to '402c_filtering_aggregated_res.rds'

condition_var

Variabile containing the 'condition' (group/category) of the samples (default = "Condition_dummy")

alpha

significance threshold for filtering p-values (default = 0.05)

output_dir

output directory for saving output (default = '.')

output_name

name for output file (default = "interactions_summary")

is_stringent

only keep stringent interactions (default = FALSE)
